title: Logistic growth of a rumor part - b

content.description: A certain rumor spreads through a community at the rate dy/dt= 2y(1âˆ’y) , where y is the proportion of the population that has heard the rumor at time t.
content.question: If at time t=0 ten percent of the people have heard the rumor, find y as a function of t.

frqParts.text: If at time t=0 ten percent of the people have heard the rumor, find y as a function of t.
